title: Animals That Sting
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 53 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: If you've ever been stung by a bee, you know how much it can hurt! But did you think about why that bee stung you in the first place? In Animals That Sting, students will read about different animals that sting and discover their reasons for stinging. Detailed photographs and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as identify the main idea and details to better understand the text.
reviewWords: defend, hurt, jellyfish, safe, sting, wasp
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify the main idea and details in a text
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words the, this, to
